name: comment-block-parser
description: Block parser for markdown-magic - Parse comment blocks in markdown and other files
author: David Wells

scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:mac && npm run bundle:linux && npm run bundle:windows
scripts.bundle:mac: bun build ./cli.js --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/block-parser-darwin-arm64 && bun build ./cli.js --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/block-parser-darwin-x64
scripts.bundle:linux: bun build ./cli.js --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/block-parser-linux-x64 && bun build ./cli.js --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile dist/block-parser-linux-arm64
scripts.publish: git push origin && git push origin --tags
